title: Homepage
p_01: Inspired by projects on Digital Humanities such as Perseus, I decided to create a multilingual dictionary containing the same user interface as Wiktionary, but keeping a standard format regarding the database â€” thus enabling future research on the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and others.
p_02: As a plus, I am also developing a text navigator, with which one will be able to learn several languages, and a flashcards interface to let the student review learned words with more ease.
p_03: This is a work in progress. The API is not finished, as new features are still being added. Soon, the documentation and the source code will be released, and the product will be ready to embrace the community. For more details, check the "About" section in the menu above.
